Build gradient

Source: R/RcppExports.R
build_gradient.Rd

C++ code to build environmental gradients

product_environmental_matrix(gradientlim, length)

Arguments

gradientlim

double. Environmental gradient size
length

int. Number of cells

Examples

product_environmental_matrix(10, 10)
#>             [,1]       [,2]      [,3]       [,4]       [,5]       [,6]
